props.name: onStepClick
props.description: Callback when a step is clicked (if clickable)

props.name: showConnectors
props.description: Whether to show connector lines between steps

props.name: showCheckmarks
props.description: Whether completed steps should be marked with a checkmark

props.name: labelPosition
props.description: Alternative label position (only for horizontal orientation)

props.name: scrollable
props.description: Enable horizontal scrolling on mobile for better UX with many steps

examples.title: Basic stepper
examples.code:
<Stepper
  steps={[
    { label: 'Account', status: 'completed' },
    { label: 'Profile', status: 'active' },
    { label: 'Review', status: 'pending' },
  ]}
  activeStep={1}
/>
